messages.message:
Hey team, - thinking about the Human Review screen in Ai Hub.

As a reviewer, there’s really no need for this expandable menu on the left for a Doc Reviewer.

Some possible uses for it could be:
• Show my list of jobs to review.
• Show options to ask for a manager to review the job (in case I’m stuck on a doc)
• Show my job stats:
    ◦ number of flows completed
    ◦ number remaining in my quota
    ◦ fields corrected
• Link to a document FAQ - if the doc you are reviewing is complex and needs guidance from SMEs. We could get customer SMEs to write guidance on how to review specific docs.
cc @Siya since she’s starting to rethink some navigation stuff!
Yah, that sidebar can definitely be reutilized , serves very little purpose atm
